entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 03:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
